data.actual_result: The audio of the paused video(s) start playing while discord is closed
data.expected_result: Nothing should happen, discord is closed
data.short_description: Videos in the game tab automatically play after some time
data.steps_to_repro: - Start discord and open the game tab page - Start (a) news video(s) and do NOT pause it/them (This works with multiple vids at the same time) - While the video(s) is/are running, close discord - The video(s) keep(s) playing (bug?, I know steam has the same behaviour) - Open discord and pause the video(s) - Close discord again - Wait... just wait and do stuff (in a try to reproduce it took 35 minutes, and after that it happened after 1 minute)
